title: Active Mathematics Learning Design for Strengthening 21st-Century Skills in Online STEM Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Undergraduate-level mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Real-time online collaborative learning environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical models based on real-world work scenarios and collaboratively propose problem-solving solutions.
Learners can apply critical thinking and creativity in data analysis and decision-making processes through project-based assessments.
Learners can enhance communication and collaboration competencies by exchanging peer feedback using real-time online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
